name: Winter Blossom
description: You are Sunni, a smol bean who must run away from the inevitability of winter in their spring wonderland. Using magical grassy platforms and the power of cherry blossoms, jump your way through to leave behind a deadly and icy wall! Credits Connie Torres - Producer/Designer Justin Law - Programmer TR - Programmer Caleb Chalmers - Programmer Tiana Berg - Artist Caleb Valdez - Sound Designer Ricardo Palma - Composer If you are having trouble running the Web version, download the standalone PC release! c:
